statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.name // .model.id // "unknown"'); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c gc.autodetach=0 -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=0 branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" -c gc.autodetach=0 -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=0 rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then if ! git -C "$cwd" -c gc.autodetach=0 -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=0 diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then git_info=" ${branch} ✗"; else git_info=" ${branch} ✓"; fi; fi; fi; vim_mode=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.vim.mode // empty'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); context_info=""; if [ -n "$vim_mode" ]; then context_info=" [${vim_mode}]"; fi; if [ "$output_style" != "default" ]; then context_info="${context_info} ${output_style}"; fi; ctx_display=""; usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); filled=$((pct / 10)); empty=$((10 - filled)); bar=""; i=0; while [ $i -lt $filled ]; do bar="${bar}▓"; i=$((i + 1)); done; i=0; while [ $i -lt $empty ]; do bar="${bar}░"; i=$((i + 1)); done; ctx_display=" ${bar} ${pct}%"; fi; printf " %s (%s)%s%s%s" "$dir" "$model" "$git_info" "$context_info" "$ctx_display"
